QuestData.Title: Choosing the One
QuestData.Description: I have examined each egg, $n. Out of the lot that you brought me, I have chosen the three eggs with the most promise.$B$BYou may choose only one egg to take with you. Are you ready to make your final selection?
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Instructor Tong at Windward Isle in the Jade Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: You may choose only one egg to take with you.$B$BChoose carefully. There is no going back.
